title: China today. No. 8101
creator_credit: Central Newsreel and Documentary Film Studio of the People's Republic of China
brief_description: Chinese cinemagazine items: 1. Uses of remote sensing - Talks about China’s use of remote sensing to detect targets on the forest floor. 2. Reform school - Shows footage of a reform school full of juvenile delinquents whose crimes were not bad enough for jail. 3. Ancient ape fossil - Archeologists show us ape fossils from hundreds of years ago, which show the transition from ape to humans. 4. Stereotaxic brain apparatus - Shows the equipment helping neuro surgeons in treating patients with Parkinson Disease. 5. Wool-knitting - Shows the many patterns and items of clothing a pair of knitting needles can produce. 6. Quanqzhou Foreign Trade Center - Shows footage of the Center’s show-room for China’s export commodities.
